text: beshak jo log khuda aur usake rasoolon se inkaar karate hain aur khuda aur usake rasoolon mein tafaraqa daalana chaahate hain aur kahate hain ki ham baaz (paigambaron) par eemaan lae hain aur baaz ka inkaar karate hain aur chaahate hain ki is (kufr va eemaan) ke daramiyaan ek doosaree raah nikalen
